title: Codeium — AI Tool Review
description: Codeium is a free AI coding assistant offering autocomplete, chat, and search across 70+ IDEs — the best free alternative to GitHub Copilot. Codeium is a free AI coding assistant (powered by the same team behind Windsurf) that provides code autocomplete, in-IDE chat, and semantic code search across 70+ programming languages and IDEs. It's widely regarded as the best free alternative to GitHub Copilot, with no usage limits on the free tier and strong enterprise security features. Highlights: Completely free for individuals. 70+ language and IDE support. No usage limits on free tier. Fast autocomplete. Enterprise security.
